verses.verse: וְאִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> Now the men יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel נִשְׁבַּ֥ע <S%H7650><s%> had sworn בַּמִּצְפָּ֖ה <S%H4709><s%> in Mizpeh לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> saying אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> There shall not any מִמֶּ֔נּוּ <S%H4480><s%> at לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not יִתֵּ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> of us give בִּתּ֛וֹ <S%H1323><s%> his daughter לְבִנְיָמִ֖ן <S%H1144><s%> unto Benjamin לְאִשָּֽׁה׃ <S%H802><s%> to wife

וַיָּבֹ֤א <S%H935><s%> came הָעָם֙ <S%H5971><s%> And the people בֵּֽית־ אֵ֔ל <S%H1008><s%> to Bethel וַיֵּ֤שְׁבוּ <S%H3427><s%> and abode שָׁם֙ <S%H8033><s%> there עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> until הָעֶ֔רֶב <S%H6153><s%> there till even לִפְנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> before הָאֱלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> God וַיִּשְׂא֣וּ <S%H5375><s%> and lifted up קוֹלָ֔ם <S%H6963><s%> their voices וַיִּבְכּ֖וּ <S%H1058><s%> and wept בְּכִ֥י <S%H1065><s%> overflowing גָדֽוֹל׃ <S%H1419><s%> sore

וַיֹּ֣אמְר֔וּ <S%H559><s%> And said לָמָ֗ה <S%H4100><s%> Why יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> O LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> God יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel הָ֥יְתָה <S%H1961><s%> come זֹּ֖את <S%H2063><s%> in בְּיִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> why is this come to pass in Israel לְהִפָּקֵ֥ד <S%H6485><s%> lacking הַיּ֛וֹם <S%H3117><s%> that there should be to day מִיִּשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel שֵׁ֥בֶט <S%H7626><s%> tribe אֶחָֽד׃ <S%H259><s%> one

וַֽיְהִי֙ <S%H1961><s%> came מִֽמָּחֳרָ֔ת <S%H4283><s%> And it came to pass on the morrow וַיַּשְׁכִּ֣ימוּ <S%H7925><s%> rose early הָעָ֔ם <S%H5971><s%> that the people וַיִּבְנוּ־ <S%H1129><s%> and built שָׁ֖ם <S%H8033><s%> there מִזְבֵּ֑חַ <S%H4196><s%> there an altar וַיַּעֲל֥וּ <S%H5927><s%> and offered עֹל֖וֹת <S%H5930><s%> burnt offerings וּשְׁלָמִֽים׃ <S%H8002><s%> and peace offerings פ

וַיֹּֽאמְרוּ֙ <S%H559><s%> said בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> And the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel מִ֠י <S%H4310><s%> Who אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> that לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> did not עָלָ֧ה <S%H5927><s%> came בַקָּהָ֛ל <S%H6951><s%> not up with the congregation מִכָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all שִׁבְטֵ֥י <S%H7626><s%> Who [is there] among all the tribes יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> to the LORD כִּי֩ <S%H3588><s%> for הַשְּׁבוּעָ֨ה <S%H7621><s%> oath הַגְּדוֹלָ֜ה <S%H1419><s%> A great הָיְתָ֗ה <S%H1961><s%> become לַ֠אֲשֶׁר <S%H834><s%> who לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> did not עָלָ֨ה <S%H5927><s%> concerning him that came not up אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יְהוָ֧ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD הַמִּצְפָּ֛ה <S%H4709><s%> to Mizpeh לֵאמֹ֖ר <S%H559><s%> saying מ֥וֹת <S%H4191><s%> He shall surely יוּמָֽת׃ <S%H4191><s%> be put to death

וַיִּנָּֽחֲמוּ֙ <S%H5162><s%> repented בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> And the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about בִּנְיָמִ֖ן <S%H1144><s%> them for Benjamin אָחִ֑יו <S%H251><s%> their brother וַיֹּ֣אמְר֔וּ <S%H559><s%> and said נִגְדַּ֥ע <S%H1438><s%> cut off הַיּ֛וֹם <S%H3117><s%> this day שֵׁ֥בֶט <S%H7626><s%> tribe אֶחָ֖ד <S%H259><s%> There is one מִיִּשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> from Israel

מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> What נַּעֲשֶׂ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> How shall we do לָהֶ֛ם לַנּוֹתָרִ֖ים <S%H3498><s%> for them that remain לְנָשִׁ֑ים <S%H802><s%> for wives וַאֲנַ֙חְנוּ֙ <S%H587><s%> we נִשְׁבַּ֣עְנוּ <S%H7650><s%> seeing we have sworn בַֽיהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> by the LORD לְבִלְתִּ֛י <S%H1115><s%> not תֵּת־ <S%H5414><s%> that we will not give לָהֶ֥ם מִבְּנוֹתֵ֖ינוּ <S%H1323><s%> them of our daughters לְנָשִֽׁים׃ <S%H802><s%> wives

וַיֹּ֣אמְר֔וּ <S%H559><s%> And they said מִ֗י <S%H4310><s%> What אֶחָד֙ <S%H259><s%> What one מִשִּׁבְטֵ֣י <S%H7626><s%> [is there] of the tribes יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel אֲשֶׁ֛ר <S%H834><s%> who לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> no עָלָ֥ה <S%H5927><s%> that came not up אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD הַמִּצְפָּ֑ה <S%H4709><s%> to Mizpeh וְ֠הִנֵּה <S%H2009><s%> behold לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> no בָא־ <S%H935><s%> had come אִ֧ישׁ <S%H376><s%> none אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַֽמַּחֲנֶ֛ה <S%H4264><s%> to the camp מִיָּבֵ֥ישׁ <S%H3003><s%> Jobesh גִּלְעָ֖ד <S%H1568><s%> Gilead אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַקָּהָֽל׃ <S%H6951><s%> to the assembly

וַיִּתְפָּקֵ֖ד <S%H6485><s%> were numbered הָעָ֑ם <S%H5971><s%> For the people וְהִנֵּ֤ה <S%H2009><s%> behold אֵֽין־ <S%H369><s%> else שָׁם֙ <S%H8033><s%> was there אִ֔ישׁ <S%H376><s%> and behold [there were] none מִיּוֹשְׁבֵ֖י <S%H3427><s%> of the inhabitants יָבֵ֥שׁ <S%H3003><s%> Jobesh גִּלְעָֽד׃ <S%H1568><s%> Gilead

וַיִּשְׁלְחוּ־ <S%H7971><s%> sent שָׁ֣ם <S%H8033><s%> there הָעֵדָ֗ה <S%H5712><s%> And the congregation שְׁנֵים־ <S%H8147><s%> both עָשָׂ֥ר <S%H6240><s%> ten אֶ֛לֶף <S%H505><s%> thousand אִ֖ישׁ <S%H376><s%> men מִבְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> warriors הֶחָ֑יִל <S%H2428><s%> of the valiant וַיְצַוּ֨וּ <S%H6680><s%> and commanded אוֹתָ֜ם <S%H853><s%> לֵאמֹ֗ר <S%H559><s%> them saying לְ֠כוּ <S%H1980><s%> Go וְהִכִּיתֶ֞ם <S%H5221><s%> and smite אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יוֹשְׁבֵ֨י <S%H3427><s%> the inhabitants יָבֵ֤שׁ <S%H3003><s%> Jobesh גִּלְעָד֙ <S%H1568><s%> Gilead לְפִי־ <S%H6310><s%> with the edge חֶ֔רֶב <S%H2719><s%> of the sword וְהַנָּשִׁ֖ים <S%H802><s%> with the women וְהַטָּֽף׃ <S%H2945><s%> and the children

וְזֶ֥ה <S%H2088><s%> This הַדָּבָ֖ר <S%H1697><s%> And this [is] the thing אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> you תַּעֲשׂ֑וּ <S%H6213><s%> that ye shall do כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> every זָכָ֗ר <S%H2145><s%> every male וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and every אִשָּׁ֛ה <S%H802><s%> and every woman יֹדַ֥עַת <S%H3045><s%> by man מִשְׁכַּב־ <S%H4904><s%> that hath lain זָכָ֖ר <S%H2145><s%> A man תַּחֲרִֽימוּ׃ <S%H2763><s%> Ye shall utterly destroy

וַֽיִּמְצְא֞וּ <S%H4672><s%> And they found מִיּוֹשְׁבֵ֣י ׀ <S%H3427><s%> among the inhabitants יָבֵ֣ישׁ <S%H3003><s%> Jobesh גִּלְעָ֗ד <S%H1568><s%> Gilead אַרְבַּ֤ע <S%H702><s%> four מֵאוֹת֙ <S%H3967><s%> hundred נַעֲרָ֣ה <S%H5291><s%> young בְתוּלָ֔ה <S%H1330><s%> virgins אֲשֶׁ֧ר <S%H834><s%> who לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> had not יָדְעָ֛ה <S%H3045><s%> that had known אִ֖ישׁ <S%H376><s%> no man לְמִשְׁכַּ֣ב <S%H4904><s%> by lying זָכָ֑ר <S%H2145><s%> with any male וַיָּבִ֨יאוּ <S%H935><s%> and they brought אוֹתָ֤ם <S%H853><s%> אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַֽמַּחֲנֶה֙ <S%H4264><s%> them unto the camp שִׁלֹ֔ה <S%H7887><s%> to Shiloh אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> which בְּאֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> which [is] in the land כְּנָֽעַן׃ <S%H3667><s%> of Canaan ס

וַֽיִּשְׁלְחוּ֙ <S%H7971><s%> sent כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> the whole הָ֣עֵדָ֔ה <S%H5712><s%> And the whole congregation וַֽיְדַבְּרוּ֙ <S%H1696><s%> [some] to speak אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> to the children בִנְיָמִ֔ן <S%H1144><s%> of Benjamin אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> who בְּסֶ֣לַע <S%H5553><s%> that [were] in the rock רִמּ֑וֹן <S%H7417><s%> Rimmon וַיִּקְרְא֥וּ <S%H7121><s%> and to call לָהֶ֖ם שָׁלֽוֹם׃ <S%H7965><s%> peaceably

וַיָּ֤שָׁב <S%H7725><s%> came again בִּנְיָמִן֙ <S%H1144><s%> And Benjamin בָּעֵ֣ת <S%H6256><s%> at that time הַהִ֔יא <S%H1931><s%> and they וַיִּתְּנ֤וּ <S%H5414><s%> and they gave לָהֶם֙ הַנָּשִׁ֔ים <S%H802><s%> them wives אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> whom חִיּ֔וּ <S%H2421><s%> which they had saved alive מִנְּשֵׁ֖י <S%H802><s%> of the women יָבֵ֣שׁ <S%H3003><s%> Jobesh גִּלְעָ֑ד <S%H1568><s%> Gilead וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> not מָצְא֥וּ <S%H4672><s%> and yet so they sufficed לָהֶ֖ם כֵּֽן׃ <S%H3651><s%> enough

וְהָעָ֥ם <S%H5971><s%> And the people נִחָ֖ם <S%H5162><s%> repented לְבִנְיָמִ֑ן <S%H1144><s%> them for Benjamin כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> because עָשָׂ֧ה <S%H6213><s%> had made יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> because that the LORD פֶּ֖רֶץ <S%H6556><s%> a breach בְּשִׁבְטֵ֥י <S%H7626><s%> in the tribes יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel

וַיֹּֽאמְר֨וּ <S%H559><s%> said זִקְנֵ֣י <S%H2205><s%> Then the elders הָעֵדָ֔ה <S%H5712><s%> of the congregation מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> shall we נַּעֲשֶׂ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> How shall we do לַנּוֹתָרִ֖ים <S%H3498><s%> for them that remain לְנָשִׁ֑ים <S%H802><s%> for wives כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> since נִשְׁמְדָ֥ה <S%H8045><s%> are destroyed מִבִּנְיָמִ֖ן <S%H1144><s%> Benjamin אִשָּֽׁה׃ <S%H802><s%> seeing the women

וַיֹּ֣אמְר֔וּ <S%H559><s%> And they said יְרֻשַּׁ֥ת <S%H3425><s%> [There must be] an inheritance פְּלֵיטָ֖ה <S%H6413><s%> for them that be escaped לְבִנְיָמִ֑ן <S%H1144><s%> of Benjamin וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> so יִמָּחֶ֥ה <S%H4229><s%> be not destroyed שֵׁ֖בֶט <S%H7626><s%> that a tribe מִיִּשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> out of Israel

וַאֲנַ֗חְנוּ <S%H587><s%> ourselves לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not נוּכַ֛ל <S%H3201><s%> Howbeit we may לָתֵת־ <S%H5414><s%> not give לָהֶ֥ם נָשִׁ֖ים <S%H802><s%> them wives מִבְּנוֹתֵ֑ינוּ <S%H1323><s%> of our daughters כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for נִשְׁבְּע֤וּ <S%H7650><s%> have sworn בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> for the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> saying אָר֕וּר <S%H779><s%> Cursed נֹתֵ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> [be] he that giveth אִשָּׁ֖ה <S%H802><s%> a wife לְבִנְיָמִֽן׃ <S%H1144><s%> to Benjamin ס

וַיֹּאמְר֡וּ <S%H559><s%> Then they said הִנֵּה֩ <S%H2009><s%> Behold חַג־ <S%H2282><s%> Behold [there is] a feast יְהוָ֨ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD בְּשִׁל֜וֹ <S%H7887><s%> in Shiloh מִיָּמִ֣ים ׀ <S%H3117><s%> year יָמִ֗ימָה <S%H3117><s%> to year אֲשֶׁ֞ר <S%H834><s%> which מִצְּפ֤וֹנָה <S%H6828><s%> [in a place] which [is] on the north side לְבֵֽית־ אֵל֙ <S%H1008><s%> of Bethel מִזְרְחָ֣ה <S%H4217><s%> east side הַשֶּׁ֔מֶשׁ <S%H8121><s%> east side לִמְסִלָּ֔ה <S%H4546><s%> of the highway הָעֹלָ֥ה <S%H5927><s%> that goeth up מִבֵּֽית־ אֵ֖ל <S%H1008><s%> from Bethel שְׁכֶ֑מָה <S%H7927><s%> to Shechem וּמִנֶּ֖גֶב <S%H5045><s%> and on the south לִלְבוֹנָֽה׃ <S%H3829><s%> of Lebonah
